ResearchProjectDef.label: mobile mineral sonar
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Study the famous MiningCo. MiSoTech* to develop a mineral sonar able to scan and detect ore pockets in the heart of mountains.
* MiSoTech: Mineral Sonar Technology

ResearchProjectDef.label: mobile mineral sonar: enhanced scan
ResearchProjectDef.description:
By doing some code refactoring and optimisations in the MiSoTech* noise reduction algorithms, your can improve the mobile mineral sonar efficiency.
Mobile mineral sonar scan range is increased (30 -> 50). Mobile mineral sonar detection chance is improved.
* MiSoTech: Mineral Sonar Technology
